name: Myotismon
effect: [When Digivolving] Trash the top 2 cards of your deck. Then, you may play 1 [Yukio Oikawa] from your trash without paying its memory cost.
digivolve_effect: [On Deletion] If this Digimon has [Myotismon] in its name, you may play 1 [Yukio Oikawa] from your hand or trash suspended without paying its memory cost.
